idea: Health Care Finance fintech catering to entire health care ecosystem
name: DIGISPARSH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
At the outset I thank you for your time and your patient hearing regarding the company Perfect engineers.

 

I will be obliged if you can help us with the vendor registration process and give us an opportunity to work with your organization. 


This is to also inform you that We have maintained a good relationship with manufacturing Company of Steel plant, Cement plant ,Sugar plant and Paper mill for Equipment’s and Spares. 

 

Our company is specializes in manufacturing of :-

 

1) Steel plant spares and equipment’s.

 

Blast furnace, Coke oven batteries, Continuous casting machine Gear boxes, Skip winches,frames,Dummy bar, Drive pulley wheel, Rollers ,Skip winch Etc. 

 

2) E.O.T Cranes spares and equipment’s.

 

Double Girder, Single Girder, Goliath Cranes, and spares like Gear boxes, Wheel assembly, Rope drum, Brake drum,Gear couplings,etc…

 

3) Railway wagon spares and equipment’s.

 

 Wheels and axle sets, wheels, axles, spring, housing etc.

 

4) Cement plant spares and equipment’s ..

 

Gear and pinion, Belt Pulley, Conveyor Roller, Bearing-Housing etc.

We intend to expand further into etc. Our head office is located in India and apart from that, we have 2 branches in different countries worldwide.

The team of engineers and developers at our firm are the best in their way, and we promise to provide timely service to our esteemed clients. We can discuss how to go about manufacturing devices coping with the latest technology.


Thank you.
name: PERFECT ENGINEERS

idea: Biosensika Labs is a young start-up launched in 2019 to develop and market innovative nanotechnology based diagnostics solutions including generation of biochemical reagents, bio-receptors (aptamers), sensor design and kit development. Biosensika Labs is pioneering a new sensitive and specific proprietary nanobiotechnology based sensing platforms relying on more than 15 years of research and development.
name: BIOSENSIKA LABS LLP

idea:
Hygrid Power is a stationary fuel cell and renewable energy power company developing 24-hour energy from renewable and low carbon sources.

Our solutions are wide ranged from gasification, biofuels, clean energy (Low carbon alternative fuels), fuel cell technology and heat to power (H2P).

HyGrid’s core business comprises designing, manufacturing, and developing from patented technologies to produce biofuels/low-carbon alternative fuels, repurposing carbon already in the environment.
name: HyGrid India LLC

idea:
We at lemon tree exhibitions Pvt ltd are pioneers in exhibition space designing and fabrication. We have worked with more than 1200 domestics and international clients from various industries. Due to ongoing COVID-19 pandemic our industry has come to a complete halt.

We have decided to diverge our expertise, experience, knowledge, and service to convert this challenging time into an opportunity. We are doing our bit and starting a new journey to educate our community by providing essential solutions to live LIFE in the New Normal.
name: LEMON TREE EXHIBITIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
MANUFACTURER OF INDUSTRIAL, INSTITUTIONAL AND GENERAL HOMECARE CLEANING PRODUCTS


Established in the year 2015, we, “Abcube Industries Pvt. Ltd.”, are a prominent manufacturer & supplier of premium quality Sanitation Products. These products are manufactured using optimum quality raw material with contemporary techniques and machines. Our professionals make sure that entire range is manufactured or processed in compliance with the set industry norms and standards. The products we offer are widely acknowledged for their precise pH value, easy maintenance, admirable quality, optimum performance, purity and safe usage.

We have established a sound infrastructure, which helps in proper execution of all the business tasks. Our infrastructure is facilitated with contemporary machines and techniques which help in meeting the bulk requirements of the clients and that too within stipulated time-frame. Moreover, we have hired a skilled and proficient team of professionals to carry out all our activities of business in a dexterous manner. Furthermore, to ease out the tedious process of monetary transactions, we accept payment via various easy modes. Also, we ensure that the consignments are timely delivered at clients' destination via our wide distribution network. Owing to all these factors, we have been able to position ourselves ahead of our competitors across the markets of Indian Subcontinent.

Under the constant motivation and visionary guidance of our mentors, 'Mr. Kunal Agiwale', we are counted among the leading firms of this domain. Their brilliant managerial skills, vast industry experience and in-depth knowledge have enabled us to muster a vast clientele base.
name: ABCUBE INDUSTRIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
WE ARE INTO MANUFACTURING OF CUSTOMIZED ELECTRONICS .

DESIGNING FROM CONCEPT TO PROTOTYPE TO PRODUCTION
name: INDIAN RESEARCH CENTRE

idea: Mintjunction Technologies is a fintech firm into cash collection. We tie-up with Banking Correspondents and use their large merchant network for cash collection. The basic service offered is for the customers and agents of NBFCs who use the merchant network for depositing EMI payments.
name: MINTJUNCTION TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
quickBPM enables automation of any business process irrespective of the function. Be it a sales tracking and reporting process, where ever traveling executives need to connect with the central database and collaborate with other functions to close a deal or be it an end to end HR process.

quickBPM adds value to every organization irrespective of its size and scale. Every organization has specific pain-points and quickBPM helps to resolve those quickly.
name: workflowed solution pvt.ltd.

idea:
It's an Idea of website shaharyaar.com (domain purchased). which is going to be dedicated to different cities of India.

A Documentary on every city by which all the residences, visitor's or travellers who visit

to that city will be able to explore - The hotel's, residence places, and other prominent places, prominent food & market places and other things.


In short, our plan is to capture the identity of a City in A Video.


for this, we will visit the cities according to plan and shoot into a poetic documentary. 

In this documentary, we will add famous places and known-unknown markets, historical sites of the City. 

And after done with a shoot on a city we will Promote & Release 3-4 videos about one city. In those Vedio's there will be a combination of pictures, videos & tag lines to attract people's & the citizens of that cities.... so they can get attached to the video and promote themselves too.
name: Shahar yaar
